DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the investigation is to confirm the safety of patients receiving Symbicort Turbuhaler as maintenance and reliever therapy ( Symbicort SMART) under the post-marketing actual use.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Experience Investigation of Symbicort Turbuhaler as Maintenance Therapy and Reliever Therapy
DOC.detailed_description: Symbicort Turbuhaler 30/60 Clinical Experience Investigation for treatment with Symbicort as maintenance therapy and as needed in response to symptoms
DOC.criteria: Patients receiving Symbicort Turbuhaler as maintenance and reliever therapy for the first time due to 'bronchial asthma ',and possibly requiring asneeded inhalations during the observation period
